outlive.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to remain alive after someone else has died
outlive.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: She outlived her husband by 20 years.
outlive.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to continue to exist after something else has ended or disappeared
outlive.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Good books have a way of outliving those who want to ban them.
